item.description:
We will be collecting non-perishable food to be donated to the RI Community Food Bank. With the upcoming holiday season approaching the RI Food Bank needs as much help as they can get. So please help us help them. Last year RIAS members donated 80lbs of food, this year we hope to double that

Meet-up with other local atheists for some food, drink and great disucssion. We meet in the Function Room in the back of the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the private function room.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society November Meetup and Food Drive
